name: HiMirrorSmartPlug
0:
”Alexa, turn on Smart Plug.”
”Alexa, turn off Smart Plug.”
”Alexa, turn on bedroom lamp.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can use this skill to control HiMirror Smart Plug with using voice command.

Please follow below steps to enable skill and control HiMirror Smart Plug:

[1]. Please confirm your HiMirror Smart Plug has already been set up with your HiMirror Smart App.

[2]. Click Enable Skill button to enable skill and login with your HiMirror Smart account and password.

[3]. You can say "Alexa, discover devices" from HiMirror or any Alexa echo devices and wait till it says "discover is completed".

[4]. Now all setup is done. You can say "Alexa, turn on/off [Plug Name]" to turn on/off Plug, Plug default name is Smart Plug, you can also change name yourself in the device settings page on Alexa App.
